leads.lead_text: Leaves (1.5–)2–5(–8.5) mm wide, flat or nearly so, leathery or firm, with apex usually entire in mature leaves (points readily eroded)
Leaves 0.5–1.5 mm wide, folded to strongly inrolled, or flat, flexible or rigid, with 1–3 minute points at apex
